doc:
Violet Carson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violet_Carson 0 Violet Helen Carson, OBE (1 September 1898 – 26 December 1983) was a British actress of radio and television, and a singer and pianist, who had a long and celebrated career as an actress and performer during the early days of BBC radio, and during the latter decades of her life as the matronly Christian widow, town gossip and original battle-axe Ena Sharples in the ITV television soap opera Coronation Street. Violet_Helen_Carson , OBE ( 1_September_1898 – 26_December_1983 ) was a_British_actress of radio_and_television , and a_singer_and_pianist , who had a_long_and_celebrated_career as an_actress_and_performer during the_early_days of BBC_radio , and during the_latter_decades of her_life as the_matronly_Christian_widow , town_gossip and original_battle-axe_Ena_Sharples in the_ITV_television_soap_opera_Coronation_Street .
